website_summaries.verdict: Boasting comfort and performance that’s comparable to more expensive varieties. However, you may want to order a size up as they’ve been known to run small.
pros: Good arch support and nicely padded soles
Socks stay in place and don’t slip into the shoe
Features double dry moisture wicking technology to keep feet fresh and comfortable
cons: A few wearers note that the black socks leave a fuzzy residue even after a couple of washes

customer_reviews.title: Best socks I’ve ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These Champion socks are by far the best I’ve owned! They are so comfortable and feel great on my feet! The fit of the socks is incredible! I was hesitant about these at first because I’ve tried a lot of socks that are similar to these in price but nothing has come close to these. The thickness of the sock is great it feels like it should hold up for a while, but overall I would definitely recommend these socks to anyone that has a hard time finding socks big enough to fit your feet! If you have any questions feel free to ask! Also if you found my review to be helpful please check this was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry&David

customer_reviews.title: Great Style | Comfortable | Disposable Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great style and feels very comfortable but the quality is terrible. It only takes a few cycles of wash and use before the heels develop a hole. Had they reinforced the heels so that it would last longer, it could have been a 5 start product. I hate companies and products that waste environmental resources and deliberately manufacture a product that falls apart so that they can sell more. Raise the price and create something that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Shervin

customer_reviews.title: Be careful about the seller, thick and comfy if you get it right
customer_reviews.text: I really like these socks, they are made of thick cotton, are comfy and absorb sweat very well. I ordered these three times, two from the prime seller and once from another seller. The non-prime seller sent me socks that are very thin and completely synthetic. They wanted me to pay for the return as well as charging restocking fee for their inferior product. The original product is very high quality, so make sure you buy it from the right seller. (5->4 stars for lack in quality control among sellers)
customer_reviews.author: magicharp

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality — Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly low-quality fabric and stitching. Started developing holes / tears at heels and soles after the third wash; three months after purchase, all 6 pairs had fallen apart and were unwearable. This seems to represent a trend in the garment industry over the past few years, with everything cheap and foreign-made; rarely does a pair of socks or boxer shorts last longer than 4 months anymore. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality than expected, holding up well
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality than the 3x expensive Soft Breath Performance Running Socks I purchased at same time. Thicker / more cushion and still cooler / more breathable due to higher % cotton. No pilling, stretching, fading after ~10 wash cycles. Like most cotton socks they tighten up in wash so, I recommend ordering the largest size available. They will stretch back out to fit your feet. Thickness depends on how much stretch. Even if you have small feet (e.g. Men's 5) the size 10-13 socks will fit fine. They might be too small if you have large feet (e.g. Men's 13).
customer_reviews.author: Buck Minster

customer_reviews.title: Almost large enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a 're-order' from a previous purchase from Amazon. I wear a size 13 shoe, so I ordered the 13-15 size sock, just to make sure they would fit. This time they seemed slightly shorter/smaller, so I was disappointed: they just don't stay up high enough on my heel. I will try to stretch them out after a wash and see if I can get them to work. The first order fit me just fine though. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: John Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Well that didn’t last long...
customer_reviews.text: After 3 wear and washes... every other sock started getting holes in it. Out of 6 pairs, I’m left with 1 good pair. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great sock, just pick the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 11 and chose the size 12-14 shoe based on some other reviews. I figured a little large over a little bit small would be better. But.... They fit absolutely perfectly. Don't slip off, not too tight. When I opened them, they seemed thicker and more dense then my previous pairs of similar style, but they fit well and are comfy. I have been using them at work and at the gym and they feel great. Not too hot and breathe well. Despite the small mismatch with size, they are great socks for a good price. I'd say the 12-14 listed size would fit 10-12, maybe even 13 if you like them a bit tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Too much lint
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased these socks and loved them. They must have changed manufacturing processes because they leave sooo much lint on the carpet - even after multiple washes. My feet are covered in lint when taking these off. Buy another brand - I have to vacuum every time I wear these socks.
customer_reviews.author: James Burriss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect socks for summer
customer_reviews.text: The only sock I wear with shoes all summer long or at the gym. Keeps you cool and doesn't show on most shoes. Durability is very good, too. I have been wearing these for a 3-4 years now and none of my original pairs have holes or runs or anything. Every summer I buy another pack and never have to worry about matching socks straight out of the laundry. They're all the same. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart in the wash every time
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I've purchased these a few times and every batch I get stains everything you wash it with at first, then after that fall apart quickly in the washer and dryer. I find little black balls of cotton all over the house. They are comfortable, which is why I buy them, but there's gotta be something better out there!
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: I like these socks
customer_reviews.text: I like these socks, but they are little small. I have big feet (size 12 ) , So I looked here on Amazon for a larger sized sock and was happy to find these. They are great socks; thick, soft cotton with a small logo. The only reason they didn't get 5 stars is the sizing. the packaging says sizes 12-14, I'm supposed to be on the low end of that. These fit me, but just barely, I'm not sure what someone with a size 14 foot ?
customer_reviews.author: Alaa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but lots of lint
customer_reviews.text: These are thicker than some other brands, and soft and comfortable. However, they throw off large amounts of black lint that stick to your feet, even after half a dozen launderings. That's pretty annoying. Hanes socks don't lint, but are much thinner.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Love them when they're new; wear too quickly
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks when they're fresh out of the package. They fit perfectly and are just the right amount of no-show (not so low that they slip down under your heel; not so high that they stick out the top of your shoes). The only complaint I have is that they aren't very durable. I find that the heel wears out rather quickly with these socks. I think they're still a good value but they could do with some higher quality material to have them last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Stern

customer_reviews.title: 12-14 feels like a size 10
customer_reviews.text: I'm a lady that wears men gym shoes in size 12w and 13w. When I found these Champion socks, I figured they'd fit perfectly since I purchased the biggest size. Unfortunately, they're extremely tight and uncomfortable. I can't even put them all the way on. I definitely wouldn't purchase the size 12-14 if you're a man with big feet. You'll be highly disappointed! If this helps, I'm going to give these socks to my 10 year old nephew. I found some other socks on Amazon that are actually a true XL size that fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. T

customer_reviews.title: XL No Show Socks
customer_reviews.text: The socks are run of the mill import quality. If you run, or exercise regularly, these socks will not hold up to your feet pounding the floor. The socks are NOT true to foot size. I wear a size 12 shoe. The xl size 12-14 socks will fit maybe a size 9-10 shoe. These socks will stretch to a size 12, but are incredibly tight, causing your toes to curl. My advise is to buy your running socks at a athletic supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy these - each sock gets holes after two wearings
customer_reviews.text: Please don't buy these socks. I cannot believe Champion put their name on these. I received these a few weeks ago and have already thrown away at least four of them. It seems that after wearing them twice, they get holes in the heels. My other "no show" socks have lasted much much longer! The material is inferior and unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: James Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Slightly false advertising, but nice.
customer_reviews.text: Some false advertisement/description. Not 75% cotton, only 68%. Not a huge deal, except I need/looking for mostly cotton socks. They do fit well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon!

customer_reviews.title: Lint everywhere, for months!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst socks we have ever purchased. We have been finding lint EVERYWHERE in the house ever since we got them 3.5 months ago! They have been washed twice a week since and we still find an insane amount of lint in the dryer and all around the house. I don't even understand how it is possible for socks to have so much lint. At this point I just threw them out (since I can't return them) and bought a decent brand. Terrible product
customer_reviews.author: OlgaMJ

customer_reviews.title: THE... BEST... SOCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply THE BEST socks I ever bought. I have replaced all other socks in my drawer. Period. UA, Nike, Adidas.... they all are conxentrating on the arch support and those all seem to tight on my feet. These have just enough flex, while providing the support you need. The moisture wicking works excellent. Throw away your other socka and buy these. I have bought the black and white!!
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: Too big when new but shrunk after wash, machine dry
customer_reviews.text: The socks were too big when new but shrank down to fit after one wash and dry in the dryer. Unfortunately they continued to shrink after washing and machine drying so now I wash but let them drip dry. They shrunk both in length and in width and are too tight now so am using the new ones and threw the shrunk ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carla D

customer_reviews.title: excellent cotton socks
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for in a cotton based sock. The fit is snug all over for my foot size [10.5 US] and the toe and heel both feel perfect. The material is plush and thick enough without being too chunky. The back of the heel seems to have a bit of extra material there, which is either for people with bigger feet than mine, or to protect against rubbing and slipdown back there. Either way I'm happy with these socks
customer_reviews.author: SeatownDub

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These fit comfy and soft, has not stretched out or lost color. I would highly suggest before wearing these it to wash them inside out to get all the bits and pieces of loose material off. If you dont, when you take them off your feet will be covered in black material - lol. Other than that, i need to order another set since a few of these have walked away or been stolen (since they are that good)
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: They're a little tight and they shed, but OK so far
customer_reviews.text: The socks, as others have noted, shed a lot. I wonder how long they'll last if they continually shed. My husband has wide, size 12 feet, and he finds them a little tight, which is quite a surprise since we bought the larger size. They aren't overly tight, just a little tighter than he was hoping. They don't slide down his heels, so the elastic around the ankle is good. They remain black despite numerous washings. We haven't had them long enough to know how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Mom & Dad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! They don’t slide off all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I can never find these socks and they are my absolute FAVE!!! Please don’t ever stop selling them! The fit comfortable bid have massive swelling in my legs ankles and feet. I try to by the diabetic stretchy socks, but they become too loose and always slide off. These stay on my feet. Every once in a while I may swell where the ribbed area is at the base of my ankle/foot and they become a little snug, but that is rare. I LOVE these socks.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Soft fabric and fancy stitching. 🙂
customer_reviews.text: Am I wearing them right? Any no show sock I buy they tend to dig in to front part of my feet. Right behind where we tie shoe laces. This one does not dig as hard as my Nike socks but it still digs in. Fabric is soft. Stitching seems great. Hard to tell whether too big. They feems slight bigger. A wash or two may reflect other wise.
customer_reviews.author: AmCust

customer_reviews.title: Review after one year: Durable, comfortable and high quality ankle socks.
customer_reviews.text: These Champion black ankle socks are very good. They fit nicely, look nice, wear nicely and do not get smelly after wearing. After about a year of wear, all six pairs still are wearing and washing well. They are thick enough to be durable and comfortable to wear yet not too thick to be hot like a winter sock.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Far too small. Return not allowed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size 12-14 version. I am a size 13. I wore a pair for a few hours. They left dark red circles around my ankles and cut off circulation. The 'reinforced heel' didn't come close to lining up with my heel. I went to return them and Amazon said they are not eligible for return for any reason. Deplorable.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Powers

customer_reviews.title: Good Socks
customer_reviews.text: The socks definitely have a premium/quality feel to them. They are thick for being ankle socks. The jar time I wore thick socks my feet started to smell (that was with boys, too) but I haven't had that problem after about a month so I think I'll be good with these. When I bought these they were being sold by champion and we're 6 pairs for 10.99, I bought another pack but now they're 6 pairs for 14.99, makes a difference but still a solid sock.
customer_reviews.author: ADG

customer_reviews.title: More on the Critical Fuzz-Ball Issue
customer_reviews.text: Over 2000 reviews and only a few score of them focused on the critical fuzz-ball issue! These things shed like an English Sheepdog- not just innocent fluffy little fuzz-balls, but weird springy, sticky, clingy, nasty, fuzz-balls. It seems to have slowed down somewhat after the first 4-5 washes. Phew! Thank goodness. My plus-size socks come out of the dryer measuring a ridiculous 7-8" long and look like they will never fit again but they are soft and stretchy and fit and feel fine time after time. Good deal, since it seems you can't trust the Under-Armor socks any more.
customer_reviews.author: MisterBearBaby

customer_reviews.title: Ok so far
customer_reviews.text: So far these seem nice and thick. They fit my size 13 feet snugly but don't seem to be pulling apart anywhere because of it. They seem nicer than a cheap pack of hanes or fruit of the loom or something. Will update if there's quality issues, although I don't expect too much of no show socks... they pretty much all wear out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for brother.
customer_reviews.text: Socks look HUGE lol they’re a Christmas present for my brother so haven’t given to him yet but he wears a size 14 or 15 shoe so finding extended size at a great price and good company is totally worth it. Will update review when he tries them on.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Toll

customer_reviews.title: 't satisfied I tried these
customer_reviews.text: After trying more "popular" brands such as Adidas and Nike no0show socks and still wasn't;'t satisfied I tried these. The fit is perfect. I am a size 13 sneaker, bought the 12-14 size socks. They are nice and snug so they dont fall down but there is plenty of wiggle room in the toes. Highly reccommend!
customer_reviews.author: benzie

customer_reviews.title: Great socks, couldnt ask for more!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually looking for some new socks after having wore the standard white long socks. I went with these because of the no-show aspect but felt cautious about the fit given it was the first time I was switching socks. Well I received the socks, they were soft and best of all, fit! This was about a year ago. I recently bought more and wanted to leave a review about it. They hold up well. No tears or anything, maybe thinner than when brand new but thats expected after wearing them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cozy and **ALSO GREAT for gliding workout discs!! **
customer_reviews.text: These are suuuper duper comfy! They are men's socks and I am a women size 8. This fir big at first but then shrink when you dry them and now they fit perfectly! :) TIP: I also use these to go over the fliding disc workout tools. I got gliding discs with bottoes that help them slide easily on a hardwood floor but the booties wear out fast so I got these socks and they are big enoigh to cover the disc as long as you do not dry them. So you can use them as booties and wash them so you can be workkng iut witb clean sock/bootie not a grimy dusty one! :)
customer_reviews.author: S Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I lost one in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: Size 12 wide and they fit very comfortable. the black stays deep black and doesn't fade. I had these for months now and they are still deep black, soft and no holes. One did escape with the dryer gnomes though
customer_reviews.author: Dive Medic

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. They were advertised as fitting size 13-15 and I could barely get them on. I am a size 13 so my feet should have been the minimum size. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Melton

customer_reviews.title: Good socks, run small
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, thick socks that don’t make my feet sweat. My only complaint is that they run small. I wear a size 13, and while I’m still able to wear them comfortably, they’re definitely too small.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality product. Socks survive a couple of wash cycles at best. Bottom part of the sock shreds when wearing and when you remove the sock you get a nice handful of black cotton shreds on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Elastic ankle opening too small - cuts off circulation.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 12 shoe. I ordered these for "shoe size 12-14". The elastic opening is too small, elastic band is narrow (1/4" wide) and therefore cuts off circulation - leaves mark around my ankle and foot numb. Maybe it's only a problem for me, but I feel like I have average size ankles for size 12 foot. Also, the advertised fabric blend does not match actual product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crain

customer_reviews.title: Picky kid likes big man socks
customer_reviews.text: My son is so picky about socks. He wants ankle socks, but all the mens regular ones he says are too small and tight, so I got my 11.5 year old big man ankle socks and I guess thats his size now. I don't know what I'm going to do when he keeps growing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: For size 9 to 11, no larger
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT for feet larger than a size 11. The ankle line is very tight and there's not much stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the reviews saying these socks are too thick. The ones I got are paper thin. I'm looking for something like the original Gold Toe before someone bought the brand and started selling crap instead of great socks. Clothing manufacturers are you listening? there's a steady market for thick, cushy well-made socks. These aren't them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Nice & THICK
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great quality! My toe always pokes a hole in the front of most socks, but these socks are nice and thick! Additionally, a lot of my other socks tend to stretch out over time, but these have held their shape. I have worn and washed these socks for a few months now and they still look brand new. Lastly, you can't beat the price. I saw these at Tarjayyyy the other day for $15/6pack. You really can't go wrong with these, I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Nale

customer_reviews.title: Not a "No Show Sock"
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Definitely not a "No Show Sock". As some reviews previously stated... the socks are too thick. They are also not tight and form fitting. When you put on your shoes they bunch up around the top of the shoe near the ankle and look horrible. I have other brands of no show socks and they look great... just not these.
customer_reviews.author: Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Will order again, good thick sock
customer_reviews.text: I am always losing my socks somehow in the laundry. These socks fit very well. I wear a size 12 shoes and bought the size for 12-14 shoes and they fit great. They're not too big and not too tight, good thickness too. Not a cheap thin sock. Will definitely order again when these inevitably disappear in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Service

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I am a tall individual and I always found the standard size 10-13 to be a marginal good fit. I was very happy to have come across these. If you are like me with the earlier mentioned observations, these are the socks for you... perfect for Summer!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Good until not...
customer_reviews.text: These were great socks for 20 days until holes started appearing. Never seen this happen with the major sports brands. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: J-Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: Socks fit to size, are no show, very comfortable, and handle sweat well. There's really nothing wrong at all with the socks, other than that they get holes in them rather quickly. I wear a different pair every day and some of them seem to get holes in them about 5 or 6 months. Depending on whether that is quick to you or not, they are certainly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Solis

customer_reviews.title: These were OK, not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These were OK for the price, but I've since moved on to slightly more expensive, but more comfortable and longer lasting synthetic socks, namely these:  I think those might be better value even if they were 3x the price, but they're not.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Balbari

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Socks
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but the other reviews about these shedding a bunch of lint are true. Wish that I had paid more attention and looked out for that, but I do not enjoy wearing these socks because of the mess they make from lint shedding all over the place and not sure what to do with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Quality socks.
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of buying socks that I would wear out in a couple of months, so I decided to look for new, affordable socks. These are comfortable, cushiony, and well-made. I haven't been able to wear a pair out yet, so in my opinion, it is worth paying a little more than a cheap Hanes or Fruit of the Loom and buy these. I recommend to anyone who has a larger foot! I wear size 13 shoes and these are great.
customer_reviews.author: AM15

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered according to size but id order up because once its washed I have to stretch them out with my hands out of the dryer and then they are ok and fit otherwise it seems slightly shorter once worn. Mens size 7 go up .
customer_reviews.author: Evna

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE, QUALITY SOCKS and a DECENT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: These are great socks! It's somewhat embarrassing to admit I'm a connoisseur of socks (ha) but I do consider and appreciate the quality of socks I wear. Maybe you are like me and it matters how a sock feels? When I received these, i grabbed a pair and slipped them on - immediately I could tell they had a nice cushion feel and were quite comfortable inside my Merrills. The first set of these I purchased have been through the wash cycle many times (perhaps 2 dozen) and they have held up and still feel like new. I recommend these and give them 5 stars for value and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Davis0172

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These socks are better than most I’ve tried but I was hoping they would be a little larger. I did order the largest available, I guess my feet are too big but they’re not bad not bad at all. Seems like they would be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas A.

customer_reviews.title: Socks shed inside shoes and on my carpet
customer_reviews.text: Despite numerous washings, the socks "shed" small black balls of cotton inside my shoe and all over my carpet. I ordered a second pack believing I just had a bad-batch with the first order but to no avail. The socks also slide off my heel after wearing them for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: My ideal go to casual socks with shorts!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect socks! I bought a set of these about 2 years ago and I’m buying more now to replace some newer socks I had received since! The thickness, fit, and comfort are perfect. I don’t like the slick feel of other synthetic material brands. The fit is perfect and thicker in areas of higher wear. I’ll keep coming back to these so long as they continue to make them!
customer_reviews.author: Bluewind

customer_reviews.title: So so product
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected however, they are thick. Since they are on the thicker side, they don't leave much room when wearing shoes. This is the reason i felt 3 stars. If you're looking for a thick sock, these are for you. They don't do it for me though and therefore, I don't wear them unless I absolutely need to
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: I do like these socks a lot. I tend to wear Converse shoes, low ankle cut. These socks work well with those shoes. Soft, wick away moisture and last a long time. Pick up a couple packs and you will be set, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Fin

customer_reviews.title: Order larger! They run small
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 11 I ordered size 12-14 after reading reviews to be safe ,so glad I did because these are small on me , I will mange with these as I hate returning items . Can’t see how a size 14 foot would fit in these .
customer_reviews.author: Rojo120

customer_reviews.title: Best casual socks for the price
customer_reviews.text: These fit amazingly and they're incredibly comfortable. They're great for running but also warm enough to wear around the house. They're durable enough and also reasonably priced. I wear these mostly around the house and with sneakers for quick errands. Great socks, if nothing fancy. I'll probably continue to buy them as long as they're on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Umber

customer_reviews.title: Good price for fully replacing your sock drawer
customer_reviews.text: Oh, man. Nothing beats replacing all your old socks with new ones. No more stray socks, just perfect matches. And the feel of these has been just as good as the feel of throwing out my old, holey socks. They fit very well, hugging my feet without any tight areas (even around the ankles, which is sometimes an issue). You will have some black fuzz on your feet for the first several wears, as is pretty typical of new socks. Perhaps wash them inside out to reduce this, or just go with it, since it's not gross or anything. So long as this review remains at five stars, you can count on my continued satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Dione Basseri

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: They were rated at sock size of 12 to 16, They could only have been a child size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Champion Quality Socks - The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I find that the Champion brand represents excellent quality clothing and these socks are no exception. I wear them when tap dancing (black shoes) and they fit perfectly and comfortably. I also have a couple pair of black athletic shoes and appreciate the thick/heavy cotton weave, durability, and stylish low cut.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bour

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Socks.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are perfect: 1. Soft yet durable. 2. They stay on your foot without that tight band around the forefoot and without covering your ankles. 3. They fit! I have size 14 feet (that are wide and flat), and it's extremely hard to find socks that fit in stores. The XL ones fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I guess this brand of sock advertises moisture wicking, I don't think it does that very well. But I didn't buy the socks for that reason so I am rating it 5 stars (as I purchased for everyday wear, rather than exercise fit). They're probably my favorite pair because of how flexible and durable they are. They don't stretch easily and are pretty soft for such a low price. Planning on ordering a few more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sock by far
customer_reviews.text: I’ve switched to these socks as my favorite. They’re thick and comfortable. No issues with my feet sweating or anything else. I think they are fading a little bit after many washes (never bleach only cold water and name brand detergent) so that’s a little worrisome. I hope they last. If not I’ll come back and knock a star off.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Weak material
customer_reviews.text: These black ankle socks lasted 1-1 1//2 years before all the heels wore out. Had hoped they lasted years instead of months. They fit well, didn't slide down, were comfortable but just not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brick ONeil

customer_reviews.title: but slightly better. I figured if I bough 12-14's they'd fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11.5 shoes, and I bought these because most "one size fits all" or "Large" socks dont actually fit my feet well, and are very tight. These socks ended up being the same, but slightly better. I figured if I bough 12-14's they'd fit better than "large" labeled socks, and, though they did, they still feel very tight. Not recommended if you have feet size 13+
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyOregon

customer_reviews.title: Why I keep buying these socks
customer_reviews.text: Though the price fluctuates, these stocks are usually priced right. They are also sturdy, they all match each other, they double as slippers, and I can wear them as "almost no-shows" with loafers and casual shoes. These are not fancy socks, but serve a purpose I have created for them, and I have purchased them multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Says shoe size 12-14, should be 8-10
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Says “shoe size 12-14”, they should say: “shoe size 8-10”. I wear size 12 shoes. These socks are tight. They are about 1” to 2” smaller than other brand socks I have that say size 12.
customer_reviews.author: K. Koffman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I used to gets the Hanes brand like this style. They got really cheap and thin. I bought these off reviews and they are nice and thick (not too thick). I can't wait for my Hanes to blow out so I can throw them away. Even after several washes they feel like new. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Wanker J

customer_reviews.title: My husband likes these socks and they are a nice think material
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes these socks and they are a nice think material. Just a word of advice to anyone purchasing, if your foot is on the larger size, get the extended size. My husband wears a size 12 and we can usually get away with buying him standard sized socks without a problem. Since the larger size was available, I ordered it. Very glad I did because the extended size looks to be the same size as my socks, which are women's size 5-9. They do have a good amount of stretch, but I am pretty sure the standard size would not have fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to athletic socks ive used Nikes for about the last 6 years with no complaints. This time around i was looking to save some money and came across these. I was a bit hesitant at first, but once i received them i noticed these were the same quality as my Nike socks for half the price. They are extremely comfortable and am now wondering why i didnt buy these a long time ago. Very happy with my purchase and amazon prime shipping always on point! (I purchased the one that says Shoe 12-14 and i wear a size 13. Fit is perfect)
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with these, actually getting ready to order more and throwing away my old other brand-name pairs I have. I bought these in white and black and love the feel. They fit perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Meier

customer_reviews.title: Great for big feet!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these socks. He wears a 12/13 and no other socks hold up as well as these. They are thick so don’t wear down too quickly but not too think that they are hot. A little pricey but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wish these had fit me like some of the images of satisfied customers. What i got were more like booties than low profile socks, as the back part does not completely cover my heel area, and these socks are very thin, so it always feels almost like it is half falling off. At least that is my tactile interpretation. I normally wear a 10 or 10.5 in Men's, ordered the size allegedly for size 10-13. If you happen to like the attributes described (sans feeling like falling off to you) this would be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: MC Ronson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.text: So far these are exactly as expected. champion is a brand I’ll always pick over any of the others bec their stuff seems to hold up longer. Maybe I’m wrong but if I notice anything I’ll follow up.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like these because of exactly where it cuts off on your ankle- they really are no show and very cushioned and soft. Definelty beat my Hanes socks.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: I like these socks.
customer_reviews.text: These socks are comfortable and fit as expected. I wear a shoe size of 11 and these it just fine. Haven't had any issues with them sinking down into the shoe. So far they are staying up around the ankle. Yes, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: E-dub

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: too small once i was wash them, i tried a new pair on before washing. Would have made a problem for a type 2 diabetic. You advertise for diabetic men, however, for me no good. I will give to the homeless.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Champion no show socks 6 pk
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a 6-pack of no-show socks. Soft and comfortable but very durable. Size is exactly as described. I don’t think you’ll find a better deal than this!
customer_reviews.author: Rose B.

customer_reviews.title: Thick, fitted, durable, and not too sweaty.
customer_reviews.text: these socks are much better then some of the duo/dry C9 (champion/target brand) socks I normally purchase. They are much more hearty then the ultra thin c9's but much more fitted then your basic sporty fruit-of-the-loom or hanes. I'm thinking these are a good middle ground that will last longer then the thin socks and fit better then generic no-show socks. Suprisingly the thickness didn't make my feet more sweaty then then normal. I tend to have sweaty feet which is why i thought the ultra-thin socks would help.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher J. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfy, soft for the price worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great socks for the price, the size fit true, nice and soft especially after the first wash. Still nice and thick and comfy. If I get a year from them I’m ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: These are socks Q('.'Q)
customer_reviews.text: You are buying socks. These go on your feet. They are made of material. They are low cut. They came as promised. All kidding aside, what more is there to say? Further details: They are jet black, champion logo on the center top of the sock. Thus far they've survived 7 wash cycles and haven't stretched yet (Lazy sock syndrome, LSS). The price was pretty good when I bought them. Packaging was a plastic bag with a cardbord top (featuring company logo, details etc etc). What you'd expect to get in a store.
customer_reviews.author: MoistGamer

customer_reviews.title: Snug..plush.  I love these.
customer_reviews.text: Had some Nike's previusly..and forgot to bring them on a trip so I bought these at a local store. Loved them...so ordered more on Amazon. My Nike's would always stretch out so much...they seemed enormous after a few uses. These are quite snug...and I love the plush feeling. Very nice socks. I threw away all my Nike's. That being said...I have a few Nike's that were better than the ones I threw out..I don't know what the deal with those were...they were just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: GaryS

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: I use these inside out because the inside of the sock leaves a ton of lint between my toes. So much that I got blisters, and the black lint embedded in the skin made the painful blisters look much more painful. Since I turned them inside out, no more blisters. Just a very comfortable and cushioned sock. You can use these alone or wear a second sock over them which cuts down friction against your feet even more. I use a very thin second sock. And my feet have never been so happy with daily sock+shoe wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Nisar Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great Sock!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this sock for a couple of years now. I wear size 9 to 10 shoes in mens and these socks are just about perfect for me. They completely cover and end right above my lateral and medial malleolus. I have not had a problem with these losing their elasticity and slipping down my foot or anything like that. They work fine for activities such as soccer, running, and hiking as well although they are not specifically designed for these activities as some other socks are.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Good socks, but make your feet sweat slightly..
customer_reviews.text: In general these are decent socks, however i noticed my feet would sweat slightly with these. I'm not a person that typically has an issue with sweaty feet, so that's never been an issue for me in the past. However, after wearing these socks, my feet began to sweat compared to other brand socks. Everything else was fine (fit, softness, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Rick Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic socks!
customer_reviews.text: The only socks I'll buy these days. I'm size 11-12 and they fit perfectly. They don't "ball up" after multiple washes like a lot of socks, and they don't get stale feeling. They wash very well and are very comfortable. If you have sweaty feet like me, these absorb well and stay comfortable throughout the day. They sit right below the ankle for a good hidden appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these socks for my husband a few weeks ago, and this is the outcome of them so far... most of the socks have officially gotten holes. At first I thought it was only the first pair that might had been defective and now these... not worth it, the fit is thru to size.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Snug Fitting
customer_reviews.text: These fit small, but I wear a 8, so I wanted it to fit as such. Socks are very good, feel very comfortable in Jordan's or my other daily wear sneakers .
customer_reviews.author: BobbyJ

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, thick, high quality socks.
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, durable socks. They're comfortable, but due to thickness they may end up being a bit hot for summer time. They've been great gym socks throughout the winter though.
customer_reviews.author: Previous Subscriber

customer_reviews.title: ... his skin would peel and thus his feet smelled like putrid decomposing garbage with hanes socks
customer_reviews.text: My son kept developing fungus in his feet and the toes on his skin would peel and thus his feet smelled like putrid decomposing garbage with hanes socks. I had to periodically treat him tea tree oil. Switched to these and his feet never smell and his feet r baby smooth again. No more need for tea tree oil treatments. Bought several more packs. Very soft material too.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Just socks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted no show socks for a larger size foot and these seem to fit the bill. Nothing fancy, but lots of cotton, which is what my husband likes to wear. Also, I appreciated the fact that I didn't have to order 12 pair of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Morrow

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: most socks have a max size of 12. That's the minimum for these and they are much more comfortable for a borderline foot likemine
customer_reviews.author: James C. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: After seeing a decline in the quality of Nike socks, I gave these a shot and have since ordered more. Very soft, comfortable and well made. I would recommend and will be buying more. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Justin E

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: you have to trust champion cause they are an American company that goes way back. With that said, these are the best socks ever....you can beat a sock that is mostly cotton with very little plastic (thats what nylon and polyester are folks...).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Cotton than Not!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear Hanes brand no show socks, but Hanes recently changed the fabric combinations to include more polyester than cotton. I was looking for a comfortable cotton socks and found it. Champion did well. If you’re looking to get rid of some old socks and buy new, I definitely suggest these!
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Husband like's them. Fit's true to size and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. Purchased size 6-12, husband is size 10 in shoe's. He said they fit perfectly and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C Sliwa

product_meta.title: Champion Men's 6 Pack No Show Socks
product_meta.description: Champion has been outfitting athletes since 1919. Whether it's sports or casual wear, Champion is for you. Performance socks with moisture wicking technology, full cushioning and arch support for all day performance
feature_bullets: White: 74% Ring spun cotton; 21% polyester; 3% natural latex rubber, 1% spandex. Black: 75% ring spun cotton; 20% polyester; 3% natural latex rubber, 1% nylon, 1% spandex.
74% Cotton,21% Polyester, 3% Natural latex rubber,1% Nylon,1% Spandex
